title: Tiramisu
steps: Place the cantuccini biscuits into the base of a glass dessert dish. Pour over 100ml/3½oz of the coffee and allow the biscuits to soak for one minute.
In a bowl mix the whipped double cream with the remaining coffee and the icing sugar.
Spoon the cream mixture over the biscuits.
To serve, sprinkle over the cocoa powder and garnish with the strawberry.
